Uses of ResourceHandler in org.jawr.web.resource
 

Classes in org.jawr.web.resource that implement ResourceHandler
 class AbstractResourceHandler
          Abstract resourcehandler implementation with common functionality.
 class FileSystemResourceHandler
          Implementation of resourcehandler that gets its resources from the filesystem.
 class ServletContextResourceHandler
          Implementation of resourcehandler that gets its resources from a ServletContext instance, as resources contained in a deployed war archive (or exploded directory).
